text: is a Japanese former sports shooter. He competed in the 25 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics and 1962 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Japanese male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Japan Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hiroshima Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Fumio Ryosenan
